scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:widget" "npm run dev:public"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:widget && npm run build:public
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../admin-frontend && npm install && cd ../widget && npm install && cd ../public-frontend && npm install
